Description: Rim and wall sherd of Attic black-glaze pottery one-handled cup with lightly flaring rim, rounded on top; glazed black inside and outside.
Curator's comments: Object owned and held by Akademisches Kunstmuseum. This record is included in the British Museum database as part of the Museum’s Naukratis Project, a research collaboration that aims to virtually re-unite finds from the ancient port city of Naukratis, now distributed over 80 museums worldwide.
Piekarski 2001 / p.47 no. D14 pl. 21.2 July 2014: See J.W. Hayes 'Greek and Italian Black-Gloss Wares and Related Wares in the Royal Ontario Museum' (1984) 61. 197 no. 101 fig. 9
Bibliographic references: Piekarski 2001 / Die Keramik aus Naukratis im Akademischen Kunstmuseum Bonn (p.47-48, no. D14, pl. 21.2)
Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (GA.1233)
